item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Colocation: Non-Clown Hosting (33 points | 10 comments)
2. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1220 points | 278 comments)
3. iPhone 16 Pro Storage Expansion 128GB to 1TB [video] (241 points | 125 comments)
4. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (282 points | 100 comments)
5. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (378 points | 96 comments)
6. A brief look at the new Kamal Proxy (40 points | 3 comments)
7. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (272 points | 50 comments)

9. Perfect prevention vs. perfect detection (21 points | 1 comment)
10. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (170 points | 75 comments)
11. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (11 points | 2 comments)
12. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (170 points | 33 comments)
13. An AI Event Hired John Mulaney to Do a Comedy Set and He Brutally Roasted Them O (29 points | 8 comments)
14. Typhoid spreads in Pakistan as antibiotics fail (14 points | 1 comment)
15. Scientists who laid groundwork for weight-loss drugs win Lasker medical award (13 points | 3 comments)
16. Launch HN: Panora (YC S24) – Data Integration API for LLMs (63 points | 10 comments)
17. EzAudio: Enhancing Text-to-Audio Generation with Efficient Diffusion Transformer (4 points | discuss)
18. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (4 points | discuss)
19. Dumped orange peel transformed a barren pasture (2017) (60 points | 23 comments)
20. Alan Turing's 1950 manual for the Mark I electronic computer [pdf] (188 points | 45 comments)
21. One Collatz Coincidence (4 points | 4 comments)
22. Show HN: Media Hoarder v1.4.0 Supporting TV Series, Introducing Episode Heatmaps (118 points | 58 comments)
23. Picking Glibc Versions at Runtime (68 points | 20 comments)
24. WP Engine sent "cease and desist" letter to Automattic (159 points | 94 comments)
25. What I've Learned in the Past Year Spent Building an AI Video Editor (25 points | 5 comments)
26. Why is F# code so robust and reliable? (51 points | 33 comments)
27. Active Ball Joint Mechanism with Three-DoF Based on Spherical Gear Meshings (3 points | discuss)
28. What Is Io_uring? (4 points | discuss)
29. Overview of cross-architecture portability problems (87 points | 17 comments)
30. Show HN: A journaling service that runs over WhatsApp (78 points | 54 comments)
